name: CachedCounters
desc:
Abstract implementation of performance counters that measures and stores counters in memory.
Child classes implement saving of the counters into various destinations.

name: CachedCounters
desc: Creates a new CachedCounters object.

name: beginTiming
desc:
Begins measurement of execution time interval.
It returns CounterTiming object which has to be called at
CounterTiming.endTiming to end the measurement and update the counter.

name: clear
desc: Clears (resets) a counter specified by its name.

name: clearAll
desc: Clears (resets) all counters.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: dump
desc: Dumps (saves) the current values of counters.

name: endTiming
desc: Ends measurement of execution elapsed time and updates specified counter.

name: get
desc:
Gets a counter specified by its name.
It counter does not exist or its type doesn't match the specified type
it creates a new one.

name: getAll
desc: Gets all captured counters.

name: getInterval
desc: Gets the counters dump/save interval.

name: increment
desc: Increments counter by given value.

name: incrementOne
desc: Increments counter by 1.

name: last
desc: Records the last calculated measurement value.

name: save
desc: Saves the current counters measurements.

name: setInterval
desc: Sets the counters dump/save interval.

name: stats
desc: Calculates min/average/max statistics based on the current and previous values.

name: timestamp
desc: Records the given timestamp.

name: timestampNow
desc: Records the current time as a timestamp.

name: CachedLogger
desc:
Abstract logger that caches captured log messages in memory and periodically dumps them.
Child classes implement saving cached messages to their specified destinations.

name: CachedLogger
desc: Creates a new instance of the logger.

name: clear
desc: Clears (removes) all cached log messages.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: dump
desc: Dumps (writes) the currently cached log messages.

name: save
desc: Saves log messages from the cache.

name: update
desc:
Makes message cache as updated
and dumps it when timeout expires.

name: write
desc: Writes a log message to the logger destination.

name: CachedTracer
desc:
Abstract tracer that caches recorded traces in memory and periodically dumps them.
Child classes implement saving cached traces to their specified destinations.

name: CachedTracer
desc: Creates a new instance of the logger.

name: beginTrace
desc: Begings recording an operation trace

name: clear
desc: Clears (removes) all cached log messages.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: dump
desc: Dumps (writes) the currently cached log messages.

name: failure
desc: Records an operation failure with its name, duration and error

name: save
desc: Saves log messages from the cache.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: trace
desc: Records an operation trace with its name and duration

name: update
desc:
Makes trace cache as updated
and dumps it when timeout expires.

name: write
desc: Writes a log message to the logger destination.

name: CompositeCounters
desc: Aggregates all counters from component references under a single component.

name: CompositeCounters
desc: Creates a new instance of the counters.

name: beginTiming
desc:
Begins measurement of execution time interval.
It returns CounterTiming object which has to be called at
CounterTiming.endTiming to end the measurement and update the counter.

name: endTiming
desc: Ends measurement of execution elapsed time and updates specified counter.

name: increment
desc: Increments counter by given value.

name: incrementOne
desc: Increments counter by 1.

name: last
desc: Records the last calculated measurement value.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: stats
desc: Calculates min/average/max statistics based on the current and previous values.

name: timestamp
desc: Records the given timestamp.

name: timestampNow
desc: Records the current time as a timestamp.

name: CompositeLogger
desc: Aggregates all loggers from component references under a single component.

name: CompositeLogger
desc: Creates a new instance of the logger.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: write
desc: Writes a log message to the logger destination(s).

name: CompositeTracer
desc: Aggregates all tracers from component references under a single component.

name: CompositeTracer
desc: Creates a new instance of the tracer.

name: beginTrace
desc: Begings recording an operation trace

name: failure
desc: Records an operation failure with its name, duration and error

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: trace
desc: Records an operation trace with its name and duration

name: ConsoleLogger
desc: Logger that writes log messages to console.

name: ConsoleLogger
desc: Creates a new instance of the logger.

name: write
desc: Writes a log message to the logger destination.

name: Counter
desc:
Data object to store measurement for a performance counter.
This object is used by CachedCounters to store counters.

name: Counter
desc: Creates a instance of the data obejct

name: average
desc: The average value

name: count
desc: The total count

name: last
desc: The last recorded value

name: max
desc: The maximum value

name: min
desc: The minimum value

name: name
desc: The counter unique name

name: time
desc: The recorded timestamp

name: type
desc: The counter type that defines measurement algorithm

name: CounterTiming
desc:
Callback object returned by {@link ICounters.beginTiming} to end timing
of execution block and update the associated counter.

name: CounterTiming
desc: Creates a new instance of the timing callback object.

name: endTiming
desc:
Ends timing of an execution block, calculates elapsed time
and updates the associated counter.

name: CounterType
desc: Types of counters that measure different types of metrics

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: DefaultObservabilityFactory
desc: Creates observability components by their descriptors.

name: DefaultObservabilityFactory
desc: Create a new instance of the factory.

name: ICounterTimingCallback
desc: Interface for a callback to end measurement of execution elapsed time.

name: endTiming
desc: Ends measurement of execution elapsed time and updates specified counter.

name: ICounters
desc: Interface for performance counters that measure execution metrics.

name: beginTiming
desc:
Begins measurement of execution time interval.
It returns CounterTiming object which has to be called at
CounterTiming.endTiming to end the measurement and update the counter.

name: increment
desc: Increments counter by given value.

name: incrementOne
desc: Increments counter by 1.

name: last
desc: Records the last calculated measurement value.

name: stats
desc: Calculates min/average/max statistics based on the current and previous values.

name: timestamp
desc: Records the given timestamp.

name: timestampNow
desc: Records the current time as a timestamp.

name: ILogger
desc:
Todo: solve issue with overloaded methods. Look at Python implementation
Interface for logger components that capture execution log messages.

name: debug
desc: Logs a high-level debug information for troubleshooting.

name: error
desc: Logs recoverable application error.

name: fatal
desc: Logs fatal (unrecoverable) message that caused the process to crash.

name: getLevel
desc:
Gets the maximum log level.
Messages with higher log level are filtered out.

name: info
desc: Logs an important information message

name: log
desc: Logs a message at specified log level.

name: setLevel
desc: Set the maximum log level.

name: trace
desc: Logs a low-level debug information for troubleshooting.

name: warn
desc: Logs a warning that may or may not have a negative impact.

name: ITracer
desc: Interface for tracer components that capture operation traces.

name: beginTrace
desc: Begings recording an operation trace

name: failure
desc: Records an operation failure with its name, duration and error

name: trace
desc: Records an operation trace with its name and duration

name: LogCounters
desc: Performance counters that periodically dumps counters measurements to logger.

name: LogCounters
desc: Creates a new instance of the counters.

name: save
desc: Saves the current counters measurements.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: LogLevel
desc: Standard log levels.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: LogLevelConverter
desc: Helper class to convert log level values.

name: toInteger
desc: Converts log level to a number.

name: toLogLevel
desc: Converts numbers and strings to standard log level values.

name: toString2
desc: Converts log level to a string.

name: LogMessage
desc:
Data object to store captured log messages.
This object is used by CachedLogger.

name: error
desc: The description of the captured error

name: LogTracer
desc: Creates a new instance of the tracer.

name: beginTrace
desc: Begings recording an operation trace

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: failure
desc: Records an operation failure with its name, duration and error

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: trace
desc: Records an operation trace with its name and duration

name: Logger
desc:
Abstract logger that captures and formats log messages.
Child classes take the captured messages and write them to their specific destinations.

name: Logger
desc: Creates a new instance of the logger.

name: composeError
desc: Composes an human-readable error description

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: debug
desc: Logs a high-level debug information for troubleshooting.

name: error
desc: Logs recoverable application error.

name: fatal
desc: Logs fatal (unrecoverable) message that caused the process to crash.

name: getLevel
desc:
Gets the maximum log level.
Messages with higher log level are filtered out.

name: getSource
desc: Gets the source (context) name.

name: info
desc: Logs an important information message

name: log
desc: Logs a message at specified log level.

name: setLevel
desc: Set the maximum log level.

desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: setSource
desc: Sets the source (context) name.

name: trace
desc: Logs a low-level debug information for troubleshooting.

name: warn
desc: Logs a warning that may or may not have a negative impact.

name: write
desc: Writes a log message to the logger destination.

name: beginTrace
desc: Begings recording an operation trace

name: failure
desc: Records an operation failure with its name, duration and error

name: trace
desc: Records an operation trace with its name and duration

name: component
desc: The name of component

name: duration
desc: The duration of the operation in milliseconds

name: error
desc:
The description of the captured error
ErrorDescription
ApplicationException

name: operation
desc: The name of the executed operation

name: source
desc: The source (context name)

name: time
desc: The time when operation was executed

name: trace_id
desc: The transaction id to trace execution through call chain.

name: TraceTiming
desc:
Timing object returned by ITracer.beginTrace to end timing
of execution block and record the associated trace.

name: TraceTiming
desc: Creates a new instance of the timing tracer object.

name: endFailure
desc:
Ends timing of a failed block, calculates elapsed time
and records the associated trace.

name: endTrace
desc:
Ends timing of an execution block, calculates elapsed time
and records the associated trace.
